price: 57 Quant à ceux qui sont remplis de crainte envers leur Seigneur
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ هُم مِّنۡ خَشۡيَةِ رَبِّهِم مُّشۡفِقُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: inna alladhīna hum min khashyati rabbihim mush'fiqūna
